cause.description:
To disprove any bull one may have heard about an affectionate and loving breed of dogs: the American Pit Bull Terrier. To exchange stories, pictures and footage of the love and entertainment brought to our lives by these canine comics. Dedicated to those who never want their babies referred to as anything but the darling dogs they are…
1. Restore the TRUE and lovable image of the American Pit Bull Terrier.
2. BSL is bull; and I don't mean pit bull!!!
cause.mission: To promote the positive image of the American Pit Bull Terrier.
cause.name: People who give a PIT
